revised_title: Irish Sea Surface Water Temperature Observations
tldr: This article discusses the temperature observations of the surface waters of the Irish Sea from 1900 to 1934. The authors analyze data collected from various coastal stations, lighthouses, and lightvessels, and present a comprehensive overview of the collected data. The study provides insights into the temperature variations and patterns in the Irish Sea, which can be useful for understanding the region's climate and oceanographic conditions.
